hibernate-mapping.query: FROM TimesheetEntry entry WHERE entry.entryId.entryDate >= :dateStart AND entry.entryId.entryDate <= :dateEnd AND entry.entryId.projectAssignment.user.userId = :userId
FROM TimesheetEntry entry WHERE entry.entryId.entryDate >= :dateStart AND entry.entryId.entryDate <= :dateEnd AND entry.entryId.projectAssignment = :assignment
FROM TimesheetEntry entry WHERE entry.entryId.entryDate < :date AND entry.entryId.projectAssignment = :assignment
FROM TimesheetEntry entry WHERE entry.entryId.entryDate > :date AND entry.entryId.projectAssignment = :assignment

SELECT new net.rrm.ehour.timesheet.dto.BookedDay(entry.entryId.entryDate, SUM(entry.hours)) FROM TimesheetEntry entry WHERE entry.entryId.entryDate >= :dateStart AND entry.entryId.entryDate <= :dateEnd AND entry.entryId.projectAssignment.user.userId = :userId GROUP BY entry.entryId.entryDate
SELECT COUNT(entry.entryId.entryDate) FROM TimesheetEntry entry WHERE entry.entryId.projectAssignment.assignmentId = :assignmentId
FROM TimesheetComment comment WHERE comment.commentId.commentDate >= :dateStart AND comment.commentId.commentDate <= :dateEnd AND comment.commentId.userId = :userId
FROM TimesheetEntry entry WHERE entry.entryId.projectAssignment.assignmentId = :assignmentId ORDER BY entry.updateDate DESC
DELETE FROM TimesheetEntry entry WHERE entry.entryId.projectAssignment.assignmentId IN (:assignmentIds)
DELETE FROM TimesheetComment comment WHERE comment.commentId.userId = :userId
